titles.title: A bill to limit private antitrust damages against occupational licensing boards, to promote beneficial reforms of State occupational licensing, and for other purposes.
Occupational Licensing Board Antitrust Damages Relief and Reform Act of 2018
Occupational Licensing Board Antitrust Damages Relief and Reform Act of 2018
Occupational Licensing Board Antitrust Damages Relief and Reform Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
